tagline: Plugin to transfer data between Cytoscape and R, MATLAB, and other tools.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Cyto-bridge
body:
### Introduction
Cytoscape is a widely used bioinformatics software platform for integrating, analyzing, and visualizing biological network data sets. Cyto-bridge is a plugin that allows sharing of network data between other data-analysis programs such as R or Matlab and Cytoscape.

### About Cyto-bridge
This is one of the Google Summer of Code 2012 projects.

### How to Use Cyto-bridge Plugin
A user manual is available here: [Cyto-bridge Manual](https://github.com/idekerlab/cyto-bridge/wiki/CytoBridge-User-Manual).
